meanings.definition: The process of making a facsimile plate by electrolytic deposition.
meanings.sent1: Electrotyping involves creating a copy plate using electricity.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed an electrotyping of an ancient manuscript.
meanings.sent3: When the robot tried electrotyping, it accidentally made a plate of its own circuits!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an electrotyping, perfectly replicating joy.
meanings.sent5: The artist's electrotyping captured every detail of the original painting.

meanings.definition: A plate made by this process.
meanings.sent1: The library had a collection of electrotypings for reference.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate design on the electrotyping.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly used an electrotyping as a serving platter.
meanings.sent4: His shield was an electrotyping of his family crest, symbolizing protection.
meanings.sent5: The golden electrotyping gleamed under the gallery lights.
